headline.main: Market Place; Analysts Favor Tobacco Stocks

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: PRODUCT liability lawsuits involving the effects of cigarette smoking have in recent years created a cloud over tobacco stocks. But a number of Wall Street analysts believe that investor fears on this score are overblown.
docs.snippet: LEAD: PRODUCT liability lawsuits involving the effects of cigarette smoking have in recent years created a cloud over tobacco stocks. But a number of Wall Street analysts believe that investor fears on this score are overblown.
